channel.title: Comments on: It’s Time For A New Blog

item.title: By: Bob Mitchell
item.dc:creator: Bob Mitchell
item.description: New site is good - but this one does look nicer - also @Dexter, we don't *all* care about Google rankings. :-D
item.content:encoded: New site is good – but this one does look nicer – also @Dexter, we don’t *all* care about Google rankings. ðŸ˜€

item.title: By: Agence Web Geneve
item.dc:creator: Agence Web Geneve
item.description: Purely talking about design, I was preferring this one than the new one. But as content is king, both are awesome. Keep us such good posts !
item.content:encoded: Purely talking about design, I was preferring this one than the new one. But as content is king, both are awesome. Keep us such good posts !

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
@Dexter -
Not really worried about being penalized by Google. I've had the domain for awhile and felt like it was time to make the jump.
item.content:encoded:
@Dexter –

Not really worried about being penalized by Google. I’ve had the domain for awhile and felt like it was time to make the jump.

item.title: By: Dexter | Tech At Hand Dot Net
item.dc:creator: Dexter | Tech At Hand Dot Net
item.description: I am just wandering what made you decide to move. I am being penalized by Google and I am planning to make a fresh one. But is it worth ?
item.content:encoded: I am just wandering what made you decide to move. I am being penalized by Google and I am planning to make a fresh one. But is it worth ?

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description: Comments are there. If you go to a single post page there's a comment form at the bottom. Maybe I should add a comment link on the front page to make it more obvious.
item.content:encoded: Comments are there. If you go to a single post page there’s a comment form at the bottom. Maybe I should add a comment link on the front page to make it more obvious.

item.title: By: Toni
item.dc:creator: Toni
item.description: The new blog and domain look great - but comments are not yet turned on?
item.content:encoded: The new blog and domain look great – but comments are not yet turned on?
